ComicInfo.Title: Matrix 7; The Apparition: An Ordinary Man; Dead Aim: Bless Me Father...; Kilroy Is Here; Flaming Carrot vs. The Flapping Head; Mr. Mamoulian: Promiscuity; Boneshaker

ComicInfo.Summary:
The eternal struggle between style and substance.
What lies between man and his final destination... death or an apparition?
A priest makes penance for his past life as a vigilante.
The prelude chapter of the all-new series beginning Fall 1993.
Part one of the world's strongest man.
